communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

According to the departments cell site simulator policy every use of a cell site simulator is logged in a cell site simulator log. Among other data recorded in the log is the date the CSS was used, the location, and whether an outside agency requested it. I am looking for the log of CSS uses or disaggregated data showing the number of times the agency used its CSS.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Dhruv Mehrotra

communications.subject: Arizona Public Records Law Request: Agency Roster
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Arizona Public Records Law, I hereby request the following records:

This request is a clone of P014768-030424; please reinvoice me for immediate payments

Please provide records sufficient to show a current staff roster of all sworn employees with your agency.

Please include;
- first and last name of each employee with their corresponding;
- badge number
- employee identification number
- hire date
- rank or position
- assigned duty station/substation/precinct/location
- current salary

This request applies to ALL sworn Department employees, including those at substations.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Marcus Boyd

communications.subject: [Records Center] Welcome to the Records Center!
communications.communication:
Dear Marcus Boyd, 
 
Thank you for registering with Pinal County Sheriff's Office Public Record Center. 
 Login ID:  164795-89401730@requests.muckrock.com Temporary Password: f48be5c85da142b 
 
If you did not submit your request through the public portal but are receiving this e-mail, an account has been created for you where you can track and monitor the status of your request, and receive any documents in response to your request. 
 
Please login to "My Request Center" to update your account information, track the status of your request and receive requested records when they become available. This is an auto-generated email and has originated from an unmonitored email account. Please DO NOT REPLY

communications.subject: [Records Center] Password Change
communications.communication:
Hello Marcus, 
This message is to notify you that your password has changed. This is an auto-generated email and has originated from an unmonitored email account. Please DO NOT REPLY

communications.subject: Public Records Request :: P016271-061024
communications.communication:
Dear Marcus Boyd: 
Thank you for your interest in public records of Pinal County. Your request has been received and given the reference number P016271-061024 for tracking purposes. Records Requested: To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Arizona Public Records Law, I hereby request the following records:

This request is a clone of P014768-030424; please reinvoice me for immediate payments

Please provide records sufficient to show a current staff roster of all sworn employees with your agency.

Please include;
- first and last name of each employee with their corresponding;
- badge number
- employee identification number
- hire date
- rank or position
- assigned duty station/substation/precinct/location
- current salary

This request applies to ALL sworn Department employees, including those at substations.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Marcus Boyd

--- Please respond above this line --- 

RE: PUBLIC RECORDS REQUEST of June 10, 2024., Reference # P016271-061024. 
Dear Marcus Boyd, 
The PCSO Records Unit received a Public Records request from you on 6/10/2024. Your request mentioned: "To Whom It May Concern: 

Pursuant to the Arizona Public Records Law, I hereby request the following records: 

This request is a clone of P014768-030424; please reinvoice me for immediate payments 

Please provide records sufficient to show a current staff roster of all sworn employees with your agency. 

Please include; 
- first and last name of each employee with their corresponding; 
- badge number 
- employee identification number 
- hire date 
- rank or position 
- assigned duty station/substation/precinct/location 
- current salary 

This request applies to ALL sworn Department employees, including those at substations. 

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes. 

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not. 

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days. 

Sincerely, 

Marcus Boyd 

Upload documents directly: https://accounts.muckrock.com/accounts/login/?next=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.muckrock.com%2Faccounts%2Flogin%2F%3Fnext%3D%252Faccounts%252Fagency_login%252Fpinal-county-sheriffs-office-3526%252Fagency-roster-164795%252F%253Femail%253Dpinalcountyazso%252540govqa.us&url_auth_token=AAA1AV6dQO2apIJ3loBoLsT2ujc%3A1sGaOl%3A1lxbK0tqOZs0qpjLChSSg8lQaau4eioTR5LKAmiHdSU" 
--Your request has been assigned to BERTHA DUARTE, they will be in direct contact with you on status and total cost associated with this request. 
Fees are applied in accordance to AZ Title 39-127 
https://www.azleg.gov/viewdocument/?docName=https://www.azleg.gov/ars/39/00127.htm 
All request are processed in the order received and will be expedited as best possible. 
Based on the nature of call, such records must go through a redaction review in accordance to Arizona Title 39 and Arizona Attorney General Rule Chapter #6 as well at the direction of Pinal County Attorney's Office. 
Please refer to the attached letter of response on timeline of when to receive such records. 
If you have any questions or need additional information, please feel free to contact my office at (520) 866-5193. 
Respectfully, Andrea Kipp #341 RECORD MGR
